data.title: Review Journal
data.meta_description: Review Journal - a place for remembering loved ones; a space for sharing memories, life stories, milestones, to express condolences, and celebrate life of your loved ones
data.text:
HEATHER A. GELLNER

HEATHER A. GELLNER

Heather A. Gellner, born May 12, 1980 in Las Vegas, NV, suddenly and unexpectedly passed away on July 16, 2024 at the way too young age of 44 years old. Heather will be most remembered for her outgoing personality, natural beauty, sense of humor, and great love of life. She was a free spirit who...

Linda Johnson

Linda Louise Johnson passed away Monday night, August 12th, 2024, in Mesquite, Nevada, at the age of 79. She is preceded in death by her parents, Leonard and Maude (n√©e Price) Timmermeyer, and her brother, Richard P. Timmermeyer. She is survived by her husband, partner, love, and best friend since 1963, David...

Leland Borgeson

Leland Francis Borgeson died August 21, 2024. He was born April 23, 1943 in Albany, California to Albert E. Borgeson and Dorothy E. Johnson Borgeson. He was preceded in death by his parents, Albert & Dorothy Borgeson, favorite uncle Raymond Borgeson and Aunt Mary Gerst & her husband Bill Gerst.

As a child of the...

Eugene Perry

Eugene "Gene" Perry, of Las Vegas, passed away peacefully on August 21, 2024, surrounded by his loving wife, Birgetta Perry, his children, and grandchildren. Born on January 25, 1943, in Tallahassee, Florida, Gene was the second of five boys born to Edith Allen and Troy P. Perry. He grew up alongside his brothers,...

Teudolo Amador Zepeda-Valencia

Amador is a Las Vegas Resident and has been here since 2005 from Colima, Mexico. He is survived by his three daughters Mia, Penelope, and Emily. Also his brother in laws Michael, Daniel, Ruben. And will be missed and never forgotten by his family and friends.

JUAN DURAN

JUAN DURAN

Juan Duran Cerpa Duran Cerpa, 65, of Las Vegas, passed 8/15/2024 He was born 8/20/1958 to Margarita Cerpa and Jesus Duran in Mexico City. He worked as owner of Office Copier Service, and retired in 2010. He was a Master of vehicle knowledge and could fix any vehicle make and model, no matter what the...

GARY T. MAZZONE

GARY T. MAZZONE

Gary T. Mazzone, 65, of Henderson, at rest August 16, 2024, with his family at home, in Henderson. Gary was born March 29, 1959 in Chicago, Illinois to Father Ned and Mother Sally (Urso) Mazzone. Married to his devoted wife Kimberly Ann (Pintoran) Mazzone on February 14, 1992. Loving father to Joseph...

ROXANNE POLLOCK

ROXANNE POLLOCK

Roxanne Pollock passed away peacefully on August 9, 2024, in Las Vegas, Nevada, where she lived. Born on February 22, 1958, in San Francisco, California, Roxanne was known for her strong faith and dedication to spreading joy and hope. She had a special mission of giving out mustard seed blessings,...

MARLEEN FRIEDLANDER

Oct. 30, 1956 - Aug. 15, 2004

To our beautiful wife, mother, grandmother, sister, daughter and friend. It's been 20 years since you left us, and you are still so loved and so missed. Love, Mark, Amy, Nicole, Jude, Carson and Hayden

Lincoln Spolar

On August 15, 2024, we mark the first anniversary of the passing of Lincoln Charles Spolar, known to his family and friends as Linc. Linc was an Army Veteran and a Retired K-9 Chicago Police Officer who served on the force for 32 years before retiring to Las Vegas with his wife, Ellen, and former K-9 partner,...

David McGuff

Dave lived a life marked by the love and respect of those who knew him. He was an iconic helicopter pilot, husband and father. His presence will be deeply missed by family, friends and all who had the pleasure of knowing him.

Warren Stephens

Please join us in celebrating the life of

Warren Stephens on Saturday 17th at 11am

at the LDS Chapel 2295 N Walnut Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89115

ALBERTA AISPURO HORN

To our loving mom, we love you and we miss you, but we know that you and our beloved Jesus are now joyously one.

Happy Birthday!

All our love, your children and family.
